data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: It's OK to not be OK, as long as you don't stay that way.

data.author: Chuck Palahniuk
data.quote: May I never be complete. May I never be content. May I never be perfect.

data.author: Christian Lous Lange
data.quote: Technology is a useful servant but a dangerous master.

data.author: Edward Teller
data.quote: The science of today is the technology of tomorrow

data.author: Marc Benioff
data.quote: The only constant in the technology industry is change

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: It's kind of fun to do the impossible.

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: We keep moving forward, opening new doors, and doing new things, because we're curious and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths.

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: You can design and create, and build the most wonderful place in the world. But it takes people to make the dream a reality.

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: When you believe in a thing, believe in it all the way, implicitly and unquestionable.

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: The more you like yourself, the less you are like anyone else, which makes you unique.

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: All the adversity I've had in my life, all my troubles and obstacles, have strengthened me... You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you.

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: Times and conditions change so rapidly that we must keep our aim constantly focused on the future.

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: I always like to look on the optimistic side of life, but I am realistic enough to know that life is a complex matter.

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: I do not like to repeat successes, I like to go on to other things.

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: Our heritage and ideals, our code and standards - the things we live by and teach our children - are preserved or diminished by how freely we exchange ideas and feelings.

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: A man should never neglect his family for business.

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: I have been up against tough competition all my life. I wouldn't know how to get along without it.
